pre-build.command:
sh -c 'OUT="$output"
PKG_DIR=$(cd "$(dirname "$OUT")" && pwd)
MODULE_ROOT=$(cd "$PKG_DIR/../.." && pwd)
MANIFEST="$MODULE_ROOT/vendor/wgpu-native/Cargo.toml"
if [ ! -f "$MANIFEST" ]; then
  echo "wgpu-mbt: failed to locate vendored wgpu-native at $MODULE_ROOT/vendor/wgpu-native" >&2
  exit 1
fi

CARGO_TARGET_DIR="$PKG_DIR/target/wgpu-native" \
  cargo build --manifest-path "$MANIFEST" --release --no-default-features --features metal,wgsl

cat > "$OUT" <<"EOF"
// Generated by `src/c/moon.pkg.json` pre-build.
// This file exists only to ensure the pre-build runs when wgpu-mbt is a dependency.

#include "wgpu_stub.h"

// Keep translation unit non-empty.
int mbt_wgpu_native_prebuild_ok(void) { return 1; }
EOF
'
